availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, resident. New York native. Married to Martha Herrick. Father of Nathaniel Herrick and Mary J. Herrick. Served as a private in Leonidas A. Sypert's Regiment of Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.). Captured in Hopkinsville, Kentucky, on August 22, 1864. Imprisoned at Camp Douglas, Illinois.

ab.bibl: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 5, p. 16. Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 0136.
